--- # jekyll header name: all-examples title: Examples layout: default ---

The following examples are published and validated within this guide to see the validation results click on the 'Validation Result' Button next to the example name.

    {% assign p_list = "" %} {% for p in site.html_pages %} {% unless p.name contains 'ttl' or p.name contains 'json' or p.name contains 'xml' or p.name contains 'definitions' or p.name contains 'mappings'%} {% assign title = p.name | remove: ".html" | remove: ".md" | split: '-' %} {% for e in site.example_types %} {% if title contains e %} {% for i in site.data.examples %} {% if i.id == p.id %} {% capture p_list %}{{ p_list | append: i.file_name | append: "|" }}{% endcapture %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
  • {{p.type}}-{{p.id}} Validation Result
    • {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endunless %} {% endfor %}
